version_description:
Thank you for using Calory!! This update includes couple fixes reported. We hear all the feedback and are working on improving our app! Next version will include an option for a premium food database source, barcode scanning, macro tracking, more HealthKit integrations and more!

Version 1.1.1:
1. Fixed date change issue on manual entry logs
2. Added date field in food detail screen
3. Tapping on food log will directly open edit screen
4. Fixed Apple Watch app crashes
5. Fixed crash issue related with iCloud sync
6. Food serving size conversion fixes
7. Fixed issues related with profile screen - weight target input

If you have any other suggestions please feel free to reach to our support via the app.

Happy counting!

Today we are happy to bring you new and exciting features!!
• Macro tracking! Specify goals and track your macro nutrients.
• Macro values now sync to Apple Health
• Today Widget for quick entry
• Premium Food Database with barcode scanning
• Apple Watch Siri watch face cards
• Apple Watch added Macros page when macro nutrients is turned on
• VoiceOver improvements

Thank you for using Calory! We love to hear your feedback, let us know if you have any questions or concerns!

Minor bug fixes and improvements. 
Please let us know if you have any questions, concerns or feature requests!!

• Added support for iOS 13 dark mode
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for tracking your calories with us! 
Today's update is focused on the below bug fixes and improvements:

• Fixed cholesterol values not showing on home screen progress bar
• Fixed issues related with reminders that caused a crash for some regions
• Today Widget, plate text labels are white color in light mode
• Resolved keyboard issues when entering log manually
• Fixed issue related with % sign not working in food search
• Fixed some issue related with iCloud Sync
• Fixed minor crashes reported

Thanks again for using our app! If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach our support! 
Stay tuned for more improvements and new features coming soon!

Thank you for tracking your calories with us!
Today's update brings couple bug fixes and improvements to restoring purchases across iOS and macOS Catalina platforms.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us via the Contact Support link inside the app.
Change your habits and change your life!

Exciting new features in this release!

• Journal View - alternative home screen layout option - see all of your data at a glance
• Water Tracking - track your water intake
• Tapping the date on the main screen reveals a week calendar that allows you to change between days
• Burned Calories from Apple Health can now be considered to adjust your daily goal
• Added ability to log foods up to 7 days in the future

Hope you like the new features! Please stay tuned for more updates coming soon! 

We appreciate your feedback and using our app. If you have any questions, feel free to reach our support team from inside the app!

Thanks for tracking your meals with us! 
This update includes some minor fixes.

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to reach out to our support via the Contact Support link found in the app.

MY FOODS
You can create your own custom foods that will appear in the search results.

RECIPES
If you are looking for inspiration or want to check how to prepare a French Onion Soup, now it is possible to do that! In the Foods page a new tab "Recipes" is available for that. You can also log the recipe directly or share it with your friends.

SIRI
Added ability to log foods using Siri.

FOODS PAGE
Now you can sort the filter buttons and for example make the Recents tab appear first when you open the Foods page. Simply tap and hold the button to change positions.

WATER TRACKING
Added water tracking feature to Today Widget and Apple Watch.
Added ability to change sizes of the presets/cups.

APP ICONS
Added more color options for the App Icons.

MANUAL ENTRY
Added ability to log all macros in manual entries.

OTHER
We have also fixed multiple issues reported by our users - thank you for your help on improving our app!!

If you have any question or feedback, feel free to reach out to our support from within the app (Settings > Contact Support).
Thank you for using our app, and stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

Added ability to create Siri Shortcut for logging water.

New and exciting features in today's update below!!

NEW FEATURES
• Copy Meals To/From - in History tap on the + icon in the meal row
• Scan Nutrition labels from Manual Entry screen
• Edit Meal Type names
• Export to CSV - export all of you data into a spreadsheet
• Added context menus on Journal View and History (tap and hold on the row to reveal menu)

RECENTS
• Recent foods now appear in Search Results
• Recent list is now grouped by Meal Type
• Added ability to remove foods from Recents list (tap and hold on the row)

PLATES
• Added ability to show title of Plate instead of icon
• Added ability to include Water in Plates

PRIVACY
• Added ability to disable analytics - can be found in Settings > Advanced

Thank you for your feedback and using our app! If you have any questions or would like to request a new feature, please contact our support from inside the app.

Do you have a minute to spare? Please rate our app on the App Store :)

Stay safe and happy tracking!!

New and exciting new features in today’s update:
• My Recipes. Create your own recipes!
• New macros to track: iron, potassium and caffeine.
• Added ability to sort macro order.
• Added toggle to turn off red particles when over daily goal.
• Added tooltip in graphs.
• Added URL Scheme. Launch, add calories, search foods:
calory://x-callback-url/scanBarcode
calory://x-callback-url/foodDirectory
calory://x-callback-url/plusHomeScreenWater
calory://x-callback-url/plusHomeScreenQuickAdd
calory://x-callback-url/scanNutritionLabel
calory://x-callback-url/logPlate?name=Apple

Thank you for using Calory to track your calories! As always, thank you for your valuable feedback and comments. Please stay tuned for more coming soon!
